author: gtully
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3276 - ConcurrentModificationException in embedded 5.5.0 broker. Rework https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-3219 - no need to set the context on thread creation as mdc impl uses an InheritableThreadLocal. This should avoid the concurrent mod, little test in mods to org.apache.activemq.bugs.AMQ2902Test

author: gtully
msg: add quick test variant to validate presence of mdc between threads

author: mbenson
msg: allow to specify name when using concat as a resource

msg: CAMEL-3623: redelivery thread pool can be configured on error handler.
